issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Add Postgres License
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11650](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11650). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
DataFusion aims to support the PostgreSQL compatibility. To achieve compatibility
parts of the DataFusion code base may have reproduced code and documentation from the
PostgreSQL project and needs the license to reflect this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11650?focusedCommentId=17332384) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/180
